title: Alston Wholefoods
description: A workers' co-operative specializing in locally produced foods, a wide range of vegetarian and vegan products, and full range of wholefoods - all organic and/or fairly traded wherever possible. Cereals and pulses (canned and dried), snacks, biscuits, cakes, drinks, condiments, Asian specialties, chocolate, ice cream, jams, chutneys, mustards and household products. A wide range of gluten free foodstuffs. Weekly customer orders taken for bulk items and special requests.
